common.byClicking: Ta hanyar danna madannin, ka amince da
common.layoutText: Yi rijista da GETTR a yau. Ka ga abin da ke faruwa a duniya a halin yanzu, ka bibiyi abubuwan da ka ke sha'awa, ka ji abin da mutane suke magana akai kuma ka shiga cikin tattaunawar.
common.minCharact: Ya kamata kalmar-shiga ta kasance aƙalla haruffa 6.
common.privacyInfo: Wannan shafi yana da kariya daga reCAPTCHA da kuma Dokar Sirri ta Google kuma Ƙa'idojin Aiki sun hau kai.
common.sendCodeIncorrect: Yi haƙuri, mun kasa tantance lambar sirri zuwa waccan imel ɗin. Tabbata ka shigar da imel da lamabar sirri da suka dace.
common.SetupYourGetter: Ƙirƙiri asusunka na GETTR a mataki ɗaya mai sauƙi.
common.youMustAgree: Dole ka amince da Ƙa'idojin Amfani da kuma Dokar Tsare Sirri
common.logOutConfirm: Ka tabbata kana son fita daga GETTR?
common.netWorkerror: Matsalar haɗin sadarwa, duba intanet ɗinka.
common.sendCodeSuccessAgain: Mun sake aika maka lambar sirri.
common.newToGetterTips: Yi rijista yanzu don ka sami bangon wallafa na kanka!
common.dontMiss: Kana da ra'ayin kanka da za ka bayyana?
common.firstToKnow: GETTR yana buɗe hanyarka zuwa ga sanin sababbin abubuwa.
common.recaptcha1: Wannan shafin yana da kariya daga reCAPTCHA da kuma Google
common.accountClaimed: Ka yi nasarar neman wannan asusun.
common.importingMSG2: Za mu kammala shigo da tweets ɗinka cikin awanni {{hours}}.
common.haventReceivedCode: Idan ya kai mintuna masu yawa ba ka sami lambar sirri a kowanne daga maƙunsanka, gwada amfani da wani kamfanin imel ɗin.
common.verifyTwitterAccountStep1Desc1: 1. Don neman asusunka, yi tweet ɗin Lambar Tantancewa ta GETTR
common.verifyTwitterAccountStep1Desc5: Kwafi lambar sannan ka yi tweet ɗin ta da kanka
common.verifyTwitterAccountStep2: Mataki na 2: Danna 'Na gaba' don tantance asusunka na Twitter
common.verifyTwitterAccountStep2Desc1: 2. Bayan ka yi tweet ɗin lambar akan Twitter, danna
common.birthYearNumberRequired: Dole shekarar haihuwa ta kasance lamba
common.birthYearSelectorHelpText: Ba za a nuna shekarar haihuwarka a bainar jama'a ba.
common.userNameSelectHelpText: Idan ka yi amfani da sunan mai amfani iri ɗaya da wanda ka yi amfani da shi akan Twitter, za ka iya shigo da kwafin bayananka daga Twitter zuwa GETTR.
common.didntReceiveCodeTitle: Ba ka karɓi lambar sirrin ba?
common.didntReceiveCodeContent: Idan ba ka karɓi lambat sirrin a cikin sƙam, saƙonnin wofi, ko sauran maƙunsai ba, gwada yin amfani da wasu kamfanonin samar da imel kamar Gmail, Hotmail, ko Ƙrotonmail.
common.verifyTwitterAccountNoteDesc1: Lura: kashe saitin "Tweets Masu Kariya" a cikin
common.verifyTwitterAccountNoteDesc2: Asusunka na Twitter, domin zai iya hana fitar da data.

errors.emailExist: An ɗauke wannan imel ɗin. Gwada wani.
errors.invalidLogin: Yi haƙuri, imel ɗinka ko kalmar-shiga ba daidai ba ce. Za ka iya sake gwadawa.
errors.somethingWentWrong: Wata matsala ta faru, sake gwadawa wani lokaci
errors.usernameExist: An ɗauke wannan sunan mai amfani. Gwada wani.
errors.usernameMinMax: Ya kamata tsawon sunan mai amfani ya kasance tsakanin haruffa 5-15
errors.usernameInvalid: Sunan Mai Amfani marar kyau, haruffa, lambobi, layin ƙasa, da kuma ƙananan baƙaƙe ne kaɗai aka yarda
errors.signupShutDown: An rufe rijista, sake gwadawa wani lokaci.

errors.emailProvider: Idan ba za ka iya karɓar imel ta tantancewa ba, gwada wani kamfanin samar da imel ɗin

errors.emailInBacklist: Yi haƙuri, ba za mu iya aika lambar sirri ta tantancewa zuwa imel ɗinka na wucin-gadi ba. Gwada wani kamfanin samar da imel daban

common.pageNotFound: Wataƙila mahaɗar bayanan ta yanke ko kuma tuni an cire shafin. Duba ka ga ko mahaɗar da ka ke ƙoƙarin buɗewa daidai ta ke.

common.contactUsDescription: Kana samun wata matsala? Sanar da mu ta yadda za mu iya taimakawa.

postRepostReplyContent.answer11: Shiga cikin Asunsunka na GETTR ko ka buɗe Manhajarka ta GETTR (iOS ko Android).
postRepostReplyContent.answer14: 3. Shafa cikin kowanne daga waɗannan yankuna don yin canje-canjen ka
postRepostReplyContent.note11: Dole hotunan furofayil su kasance aƙalla girman pixel 20x20 domin ɗorawa (faɗi da aka bada shawara su ne pixel 400x400).
postRepostReplyContent.note12: Hoton saman shafi, wanda kuma aka sani da "bana" (faɗinsa da aka bada shawara su ne pixel 1500x500).
postRepostReplyContent.note14: Domin canja hoton furofayil ko hoton saman shafi, danna ko ka shafa alamar kyamara sannan ka zaɓi Ɗora Hoto ko Cire.
postRepostReplyContent.answer21: Za ka iya canja yaren da ke bayyana akan GETTR a kowane lokaci.
postRepostReplyContent.answer26: 4. Zaɓi yaren da ka fi so daga jerin

registerationContent.answer11: Yi rijista da sauri don samun damar buɗe duk fasaloli nan take akan Manhajar GETTR (iOS ko Android).
registerationContent.answer12: Za ka iya shiga Asusun Sauri ne kaɗai akan na'urar da aka yi rijistarsa a ciki. Kuma za ka iya rasa damar shiga asusun yayin da ka fita ko ka goge Manhajar. Domin shiga asusunka daga na'urori masu yawa ko ka sake samun shigarsa bayan ka fita, sabunta asusunka zuwa Cikakken Asusu.
registerationContent.answer21: Haɗa sannan ka inganta imel zuwa asusunka
registerationContent.note21: Tabbata kalmar-shigarka mai kyau ce domin ana buƙatar ta don shiga da kuma maido da kalmar-shiga.
registerationContent.answer32: 2. Shigar da adireshin imel na asusunka.
registerationContent.answer33: 3. Duba imel don sake saita kalmar-shiga.
registerationContent.note31: Da Asusun Sauri, ba za a iya maido da abubuwan ciki ba bayan ka fita daga GETTR.
registerationContent.question2: A ɗaukaka zuwa Asusun Cikakkiyar dama?

shareContent.answer11: 1. Shigar da Wallafarka (har zuwa haruffa 777) a cikin akwatin rubutu
shareContent.answer12: 2. Za ka iya haɗawa da hotuna har guda 6, GIF, ko bidiyo a cikin Wallafarka
shareContent.answer22: 1. Shafa alamar siffar-zuciya a ƙarƙashin Wallafar
shareContent.note21: Alamar siffar-zuciyar za ta canja daga fara zuwa ja domin wallafar da aka so
shareContent.note22: Don janye so, sake shafa alamar siffar-zuciya inda za ta koma fara
shareContent.note23: Sake shafa alamar zuciya don janye so inda zuciyar za ta sauya zuwa fara.
shareContent.answer33: 3. A cikin gurbin "Maida amsa ga," shigar da amsa
shareContent.answer44: 3. Zaɓi yadda za ka so yaɗa wallafar
shareContent.answer45: Bi bayanan nuni don hanyar yaɗawa da ka zaɓa
shareContent.answer51: Don binciko wasu keɓaɓɓun hashtags ko mutane:
shareContent.answer53: 2. Binciko wani sunan mai amfani (fara da '@') ko hashtag (fara da '#')
shareContent.answer54: 3. Za a nuna sakamakon bincike a cikin a tagar da ke sama
shareContent.answer55: 4. Dubo wasu tagogin binciken don bayanai madanganta
shareContent.answer62: 1. Shfa "Bi" akan shafin furofayil na asusun
shareContent.answer64: 1. Je ka shafin furofayil na asusun
shareContent.answer71: Toshe asusu yana hana su ganin Wallafarka ko yin mu'amala da kai ta hanyar saƙonnin kai tsaye, amsoshi, bi ko so.
shareContent.answer73: 1. Je ka shafin furofayil na asusun ko ɗaya daga wallafarsa
shareContent.answer74: 2. Shafa "...", da ke a kusurwar dama ta sama
shareContent.answer75: 3. Shafa "Toshe" sannan ka bi matakan da aka nuna a cikin GETTR
shareContent.answer83: 1. Je ka shafin furofayil na asusun ko ɗaya daga wallafarsa
shareContent.answer84: 2. Shafa "...", da ke a kusurwar dama ta sama
shareContent.answer85: 3. Shafa "Tsayar" sannan ka bi matakan da aka nuna a cikin GETTR

registrationContent.answer11: Yi rijista da sauri don ka sami damar buɗe duk siffofin da ke kan Manhajar GETTR (iOS ko Android) nan take.
registrationContent.answer12: Za ka iya shiga Asusun Sauri ne kaɗai akan na'urar da aka yi rijistarsa a ciki. Kuma za ka iya rasa damar shiga asusun yayin da ka fita ko ka goge manhajar. Don samun damar shiga asusunka daga na'urori masu yawa ko ka sake samun shigarsa bayan ka fita, ɗaukaka asusunka zuwa Asusu mai Cikakkiyar Dama.
registrationContent.answer21: Haɗa sannan ka inganta imel zuwa asusunka
registrationContent.note21: Tabbata imel ɗinka mai kyau ce domin ana buƙatar ta don shiga da kuma maido da kalmar-shiga.
registrationContent.answer32: 2. Shigar da adireshin imel na asusunka
registrationContent.answer33: 3. Duba imel don sake saita kalmar-shiga
registrationContent.note31: BA ZA A iya mado da Asusun Sauri tare da data ɗinsa bayan an fita ba
registrationContent.question1: Waɗanne ne Asusun Cikakkiyar Dama da Asusun Sauri
registrationContent.question2: A ɗaukaka zuwa asusun Cikakkiyar Dama

tips.can_not_be_undone: Ba za a iya canja wannan ba.
tips.delete_comment_text: Bayan an goge amsar, ba za a iya maido da ita ba.
tips.delete_getter_tips: Ba za a iya canja wannan ba kuma za a cire shi daga furofayil ɗinka, bangon wallafa na duk asusun da ke bin ka, da kuma daga sakamakon binciken GETTR.
tips.drag_drop_files_desc: Saka fayilolin hoto ko bidiyo don ƙarawa a wallafa.
tips.not_support_video: Burauzarka ba ta dace da alamar bidiyo ba
tips.popup_loader_tips: Jira yayin da ka ke wallafawa.
tips.upload_one_format: Za ka iya ɗora ko dai bidiyo ɗaya ko GIF ɗaya ko kuma hotuna {{maxImg}}
tips.video_exceeds_size: Bidiyonka ya wuce maƙurar girman fayil ({{size}} MB)
tips.block_getter_tips: @{{username}} ba zai iya bi ko aika maka saƙo ba, kuma ba za ka ga sanarwa daga @{{username}} ba.
tips.delete_getter_tips_admin: Ka tabbata kana son cire wannan bayanin na mai amfani? Zai keta dokar amfani ta na'ura.
tips.gif_exceeds_size: GIF ɗinka ya wuce maƙurar girman fayil ({{size}} MB)
tips.image_exceeds_size: Hotonka ya wuce maƙurar girman fayil ({{size}} MB)
tips.invalid_file_type: Fayil ba shi da kyau ko bai dace ba. Nau'ukan da aka amince: {{allowedTypes}}
tips.mute_getter_tips: Ba za ka ga wallafa daga @{{username}} ko ka sami sanarwa game da su ba. Ba za su san cewa an tsayar da su ba.
tips.video_seconds_limit: Maƙurar tsawon lokacin bidiyo daƙiƙa {{duration}} ne.
tips.unfollow_tips: Ba za ka ga wallafa daga @{{username}} a bangon wallafarka ba.
tips.no_post_data: Babu datar wallafa yanzu, duba intanet ɗinka
tips.not_support_video_priview: Babu duban farko ga wannan zubin bidiyo.
tips.gif_with_media: Ba za ka iya ɗora GIF tare da sauran fayilolin midiya ba.
tips.claim_failed: Asusun nema bai yi nasara ba.
